Content: Anyone married to a person with borderline personality disorder (BPD)? It's been 8 years and I'm tired. Do they get better?

Has anyone here had a relationship with someone with BPD (borderline personality disorder)? If so how do you handle their frequent mood swings and anger? I find it so disruptive and stressful. We would have fights that last the night and it makes me so anxious waiting for the next shoe to drop

I feel my wife has untreated Borderline Personality Disorder but she would never admit to it or accept help. She has all the symptoms though. How can I navigate still having a successful marriage and bringing kids into the picture?

Ex-boyfriend has borderline personality disorder and he did a lot of hurtful and abusive things to me during the relationship. He refuses to maintain support to heal so I had to end it. I know I made the right choice but I feel really bad for him and bad about how the relationship ended. I know he made the choice to hurt me but because he has a disorder I really feel bad for him because I realize some of it can‚Äôt be helped. How do I get over this without reestablishing anything with him?

Step son recently diagnosed bipolar. Senior year at USC. Had to pull out of school, fly back home and entered in-patient facility by way of Baker Act. Has had issues since teenage years with depression and anxiety. Onset of BPD was affecting school.

Seriously difficult situation. Does anyone care to share experiences with mental health issues with BPD? Mom is severely stressed and was already dealing with depression due to career upheaval

Does anyone have any advice on managing executive dysfunction and other adhd/bpd symptoms? I'm planning on obtaining medication again but if there are any other real world /EFFECTIVE alternatives I would LOVE to hear them. I've been really struggling lately despite the therapy and meds I've taken in the past....

Just out of a 9 year relationship, where the last 4 we were married. She had BPD, which I was completely unaware of prior to our getting together. Thought I was in paradise with this woman until WWIII erupted; I walked a horrific minefield every day. My job was significantly affected though I worked predominantly remote from home. Performance, memory and consistency issues were hit or miss in day-to-day work (many times 'miss'). I feel my company let me go without putting in effort to help me!

I‚Äôve worked with two therapists and a psychiatrist. The therapists I worked with for 3 months and 4 months. The psych I saw for an hour. They diagnosed me with PTSD and Bipolar Disorder. I‚Äôm no psych expert but I was a little shocked at that. Is that normal to diagnose someone with that after just one hour? Yes, I‚Äôm anxious. Ever since I was a kid. And am now in depression but never would have categorized myself as BPD. I have a job, I‚Äôve paid down my student loans from 5 figures to 4 and will
Does anyone struggle with BPD & have looked into physician assisted suicide?

Exiting a 6-year relationship on a very positive note. However, I feel the need to do some readings on how to have healthy gay relationships, what are the watch out, what are good habits, etc. My friend is also just realizing that his partner has BPD, and it‚Äôs making me realize how important it is to get educated.

Any recommendations for books to read?
I'm here to talk if you need I have depression anxiety and I have bpd
